numbered_ace_sentences: 2. I notice dots on the line.
3. The dots have names on them.
4. Brazil is at the bottom of the graph.
5. Mali is at the bottom of the graph.
6. I wonder why Brazil is at the bottom of the graph.
7. I wonder why Mali is at the bottom of the graph.
8. People are getting better where I am.
9. The graph shows how good each country is getting with each generation.
10. The question is: What do the adults think about their country?
